textAfterTable: Justice Contact App. Reqs. Notes Honorable Tani Cantil-Sakauye, Chief Justice Neil Gupta (P) CR,   Does accept externs. Honorable Marvin Baxter, Associate Justice Rick Seitz (P) CR, T, W   Must have completed 4 semesters before applying. Writing Sample < 10 pages. Demonstrated ability in legal writing and analysis weighs heavily in evaluating a candidate. Honorable Ming Chin, Associate Justice Donna Chew (P)   CR, T, W     Honorable Carol Corrigan, Associate Justice — — Does not accept interns. Honorable Joyce Kennard, Associate Justice John Murphy (P)   CR, T, W   Transcript can be unofficial.   Honorable Goodwin Liu, Associate Justice  Pat Sheehan, pat.sheehan@jud.ca.gov, Assistant CR, T, W Submit hard copy or electronic submission to assistant.  Writing Sample 5-10 pages.  Considering summer extern applicants after December 1.  Honorable Kathryn Werdegar, Associate Justice Greg Curtis (P) CR, T, W     Back to Top of Page California Court of Appeals First Appellate District 350
